name: BNNSDataLayout
desc: Constants that describe the data type of an n-dimensional array.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutColumnMajorMatrix: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D column-major matrix.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutRowMajorMatrix: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D row-major matrix.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout2DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D first-major matrix.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout2DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D last-major matrix.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutImageCHW: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D image stack.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout3DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D first-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout3DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D last-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutSNE: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D tensor with the size elements embedding dimension, batch size, and sequence length.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutNSE: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D tensor with the size elements embedding dimension, sequence length, and batch size.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutConvolutionWeightsOIHW: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D array of convolution weights.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutConvolutionWeightsIOHrWr: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D array of rotated convolution weights.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutConvolutionWeightsOIHrWr: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D array of rotated convolution weights.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayoutConvolutionWeightsOIHW_Pack32: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D array of packed convolution weights with 32-output channel packing and 128-byte array address alignment.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout4DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D first-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout4DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D last-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout5DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 5D first-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout5DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 5D last-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout6DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 6D first-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout6DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 6D last-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout7DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 7D first-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout7DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 7D last-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout8DFirstMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 8D first-major tensor.

items.name: var BNNSDataLayout8DLastMajor: BNNSDataLayout
items.desc: A constant that represents a 8D last-major tensor.
